IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ASSIST IN ADVANCING THE WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT OF EMPIRE STATE UNIVERSITY (A UNIT OF THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK), INCLUDING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO STUDENTS, FACULTY, STAFF AND COLLEGE PROGRAMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ASSIST IN ADVANCING THE WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT OF EMPIRE STATE UNIVERSITY (A UNIT OF THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK), INCLUDING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO STUDENTS, FACULTY, STAFF AND UNIVERSITY PROGRAMS.
IRS990.Desc: THE FOUNDATION GAVE 748 STUDENTS SCHOLARSHIPS, 98 FACULTY DEVELOPMENT AWARDS, AND 6 HONORARIA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SEVERAL PIECES OF ARTWORK TO BE DISPLAYED PUBLICLY.
THE UNIVERSITY MAINTAINS AGENCY ACCOUNTS FOR VARIOUS PROGRAMS.
INCOME EARNED ON ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED TO SUPPORT THE SCHOLARSHIP AND AWARDS PROGRAM OF THE FOUNDATION.

THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (THE CODE); THEREFORE, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS REFLECTED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FOUNDATION HAS BEEN CLASSIFIED AS A PUBLICLY SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION THAT IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION UNDER SECTION 509(A) OF THE CODE. THE FOUNDATION PRESENTLY DISCLOSES OR RECOGNIZES INCOME TAX POSITIONS BASED ON MANAGEMENTS ESTIMATE OF WHETHER IT IS REASONABLY POSSIBLE OR PROBABLE THAT A LIABILITY HAS BEEN INCURRED FOR UNRECOGNIZED INCOME TAXES. MANAGEMENT HAS CONCLUDED THAT THE FOUNDATION HAS TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. U.S. FORM 990 FILED BY THE FOUNDATION IS SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: MIDDLE EAST AND NORTH AFRICA - ALGERIA, BAHRAIN, DJIBOUTI, EGYPT,
EUROPE (INCLUDING ICELAND & GREENLAND) - ALBANIA, ANDORRA, AUSTRIA, BELGIUM

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AMOUNTS REPRESENT SERVICES FOR ONLINE AND SHORT TERM ON SITE EDUCATION PROGRAMS OPERATED BY EMPIRE STATE COLLEGE OF THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK. FOUNDATION EXPENDITURES DO NOT INCLUDE ANY GRANTS OR ASSISTANCE TO FOREIGN ORGANIZATIONS OR INDIVIDUALS. FOR THE YEAR ENDED 6/30/2022, THE INDIVIDUAL PROGRAM ACCOUNT BALANCES ARE REPORTED AS REFUNDABLE AMOUNTS HELD FOR OTHERS.

THE FOUNDATION ENSURES GRANT FUNDS ARE USED IN LINE WITH THE CHARITABLE PURPOSE OF THE EMPIRE STATE COLLEGE FOUNDATION THROUGH APPLICATION PROCESS, DIRECT PAYMENT OF SCHOLARSHIPS TO EMPIRE STATE UNIVERSITY, AND REIMBURSEMENT OF GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS UPON RECEIPT OF PROPER DOCUMENTATION OF QUALIFYING EXPENSES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS PROVIDED TO MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL BEFORE SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUALLY ALL BOARD MEMBERS COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OTHER SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 96,665. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 27,092. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 40,284. TOTAL EXPENSES 164,041.
NO CHANGES HAVE TAKEN PLACE FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023.
